__prompts__.project_name: Select the name of your project
__prompts__.project_slug: Select the slug for folder name and identifiers
__prompts__.project_description: One line to give a brief idea of what the project does
__prompts__.author: Your or your organization's name

license.__prompt__: Which license do you want to use?
license.empty: Empty template just with copyright statement

__prompts__.domain_name: FQDN of your application in production. CDK will look up a hosted zone in Route53 matching this domain. Envs. like staging will be subdomains of this domain.
__prompts__.hosted_zone_id: If present, use this Route53 Hosted Zone ID instead of looking it up by domain name
__prompts__.staging_hosted_zone_id: If present, use this Route53 Hosted Zone ID for staging instead of looking it up by subdomain name
__prompts__.email_sender_address: Email address used as sender for outgoing mails (e.g. password resets)
__prompts__.email_sender_name: Readable name used as sender for outgoing mails
__prompts__.email_replyto: Reply-To email address for outgoing mails
__prompts__.test_user_email: Email for initial test user in development
__prompts__.test_user_password: Initial password for the test user
__prompts__.default_region: Default AWS region for the project
